Name: Crazy Fishing
About the game: 'Aside from the fishing...there was so much more!' - SweViver. Frills, Gills and Spills! Eat items, like flies, mushrooms and chicken wings! Grind your catch or trade it in for sweet cash! Explore and interact with the landscape via teleportation. Store items in your inventory! NO FISHGUTS IN SIGHT! Unlock breathtaking fishing spots! Catch 33 wacky and interactive fish! Track your progress with the Fish 'o' Dex! Comfortable VR experience. Logical fishing rod mechanics for an immersive fishing experience! Buy cosmetic items. Steam leader boards, are you the best angler? Customize your house and aquarium! Get hooked by our a beautifully silly sense of humour and stay for the immersion!
